typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CALL_DATE as string,
		EMP_ID as string,
		PROD_ID as string,
		ACCT_ID as string,
		HCP_ID as string,
		CALL_DURTN as string,
		CALL_CMMNT as string,
		EMP_FNAME as string,
		EMP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CallIncrementExtract
CallIncrementExtract derive(UPDATED_DT = currentUTC(),
		CREATED_DT = currentUTC()) ~> AddDates
AddDates select(mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP,
		UPDATED_DT,
		CREATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ColumnMapping
ColumnMapping alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		HCP_ID as string,
		CREATED_DT as timestamp,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as string,
		UPDATED_DT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['HCP_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		CREATED_DT,
		HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP,
		UPDATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HCPDIMIncrementLoad

source(output(
		CALL_DATE as timestamp 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		EMP_ID as string,
		PROD_ID as string,
		ACCT_ID as string,
		HCP_ID as string,
		CALL_DURTN as string,
		CALL_CMMNT as string,
		EMP_FNAME as string,
		EMP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CallIncrementExtract
CallIncrementExtract derive(UPDATED_DT = currentTimestamp(),
		CREATED_DT = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddDates
AddDates select(mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP,
		UPDATED_DT,
		CREATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ColumnMapping
ColumnMapping alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		CREATED_DT,
		HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP,
		UPDATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HCPDIMIncrementLoad

source(output(
		CALL_DATE as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		EMP_ID as string,
		PROD_ID as string,
		ACCT_ID as string,
		HCP_ID as string,
		CALL_DURTN as string,
		CALL_CMMNT as string,
		EMP_FNAME as string,
		EMP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(UPDATED_DT = currentUTC(),
		CREATED_DT = currentUTC(),
		DATA_SRC = upper('MD5')) ~> AddDates
AddDates select(mapColumn(
		EMP_ID,
		EMP_FNAME,
		EMP_LNAME,
		UPDATED_DT,
		CREATED_DT,
		DATA_SRC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(DATA_SRC = DATA_SRC,
		EMP_ID = EMP_ID,
		EMP_FNAME = EMP_FNAME,
		EMP_LNAME = EMP_LNAME),
	CREATED_DT = max(CREATED_DT),
		UPDATED_DT = max(UPDATED_DT)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		DATA_SRC as string,
		EMP_ID as string,
		EMP_FNAME as string,
		EMP_LNAME as string,
		CREATED_DT as timestamp,
		UPDATED_DT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		DATA_SRC,
		EMP_ID,
		EMP_FNAME,
		EMP_LNAME,
		CREATED_DT,
		UPDATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HCPDIM

source(output(
		CALL_DATE as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		EMP_ID as string,
		PROD_ID as string,
		ACCT_ID as string,
		HCP_ID as string,
		CALL_DURTN as integer '000',
		CALL_CMMNT as string,
		EMP_FNAME as string,
		EMP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		CALL_DATE,
		HCP_ID,
		CALL_DURTN,
		CALL_CMMNT,
		EMP_ID,
		PROD_ID,
		ACCT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		HCP_ID as string,
		CALL_DATE as timestamp,
		CALL_DURTN as integer,
		CALL_CMMNT as string,
		EMP_ID as string,
		ACCT_ID as string,
		PROD_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		CALL_DATE,
		CALL_DURTN,
		CALL_CMMNT,
		EMP_ID,
		PROD_ID,
		ACCT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HCPFACT

source(output(
		CALL_DATE as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		EMP_ID as string,
		PROD_ID as string,
		ACCT_ID as string,
		HCP_ID as string,
		CALL_DURTN as string,
		CALL_CMMNT as string,
		EMP_FNAME as string,
		EMP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(UPDATED_DT = currentUTC(),
		CREATED_DT = currentUTC()) ~> AddDates
AddDates select(mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP,
		UPDATED_DT,
		CREATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(HCP_ID = HCP_ID,
		HCP_FNAME = HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME = HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR = HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY = HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP = HCP_ZIP),
	CREATED_DT = max(CREATED_DT),
		UPDATED_DT = max(UPDATED_DT)) ~> DistinctRows
DistinctRows sink(input(
		HCP_ID as string,
		CREATED_DT as timestamp,
		HCP_FNAME as string,
		HCP_LNAME as string,
		HCP_ADDR as string,
		HCP_CITY as string,
		HCP_ZIP as string,
		UPDATED_DT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		HCP_ID,
		CREATED_DT,
		HCP_FNAME,
		HCP_LNAME,
		HCP_ADDR,
		HCP_CITY,
		HCP_ZIP,
		UPDATED_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HCPDIM
